actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 312(c) of title 38, United States Code, so as to provide for additional presumptions relating to certain diseases and disabilities of prisoners of war.

summary.text: Revises the presumptions relating to certain diseases and disabilities of prisoners of war for purposes of veterans wartime disability compensation eligibility.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 312(c) of title 38, United States Code, so as to provide for additional presumptions relating to certain diseases and disabilities of prisoners of war.
